tooltips.granulation: Granules are convection cells in the Sun’s surface.
tooltips.corona: The corona is the outermost part of the Sun’s atmosphere.

sunConfig.description: These settings allow you to modify the Sun's visual and dynamic properties.

controls.polarSpeedFactor: Adjusts the Sun's rotational speed at the poles.
controls.granulation: Controls the intensity of the Sun's granulation effect.
controls.surfaceIntensity: Sets the brightness of the Sun's surface.
controls.plasmaFlowSpeed: Changes the speed of plasma flows on the Sun.
controls.coronaGlowStrength: Modifies the glow intensity of the Sun's corona.
controls.flareIntensity: Controls the brightness of solar flares.

haloConfig.title: Halo Configuration Help
haloConfig.description: The Halo settings allow you to control the appearance of the glowing halo around the Sun. You can adjust the radius, color, and intensity of the halo to achieve the desired effect.

controls.radius: Controls the size of the halo.
controls.cameraDistance: Adjusts the scaling effect of the halo based on camera distance.
controls.color: Use the RGB sliders to set the halo's color.
controls.intensity: Controls the brightness of the halo.
controls.innerGlow: Adjusts the inner glow effect of the halo.
controls.outerGlow: Adjusts the outer glow effect of the halo.
controls.pulsation: Controls the pulsating effect of the halo over time.
controls.fadeEffect: Manages the gradual fade-out effect at the edges of the halo.

prominenceConfig.title: Prominence Configuration
prominenceConfig.description: Adjust the visual and physical properties of the solar prominences.

controls.size: Defines the overall size or height of the prominence arcs.
controls.intensity: Controls the brightness of the prominence glow.
controls.color: Defines the RGB color of the prominences.
controls.arcSegments: Specifies the number of segments for smooth prominence curves.
controls.noiseFactor: Adjusts the randomness in the prominence shapes.
controls.turbulence: Adds a dynamic turbulence effect to the prominences.
controls.flicker: Emulates a natural flickering effect for prominence dynamics.
controls.fadeEffect: Controls the transparency fade at the edges of the prominences.
